channel.title: Quest-tab related Question
channel.description: Ok guys... I am trying to make it so that when you click on a certain line in the quest tab it teleports you somewhere in the server... Example shown below. Anyway, Everytime i click to teleport somewhere it comes up with a quest interface. how can i remove this? [img]http://royalscape.clan.su/serverquestion....bmp[/img] Please help. -Ghostly150

item.title: Quest-tab related Question

item.description:
